title: old red lion pub, holborn
content:
hi id like to ask if anyone recognises this typeface or whether its a custom job?

[www.greenbuddha.com/red.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20061113000622/http:/www.greenbuddha.com/red.jpg)

regards

mike
author: balance

comments.content: MIddle one looks like Copperplate Gothic.

Given the ampersand, I’d say it’s closer to Pegasus or Octavian.

Linda

G. Peignot’s Cochin is a design based on similar copper engraving forms  
http://www.linotype.com/16740191/cochinstdbold-charactermap.html  
also Frutiger’s “President” is close to those proportions.
